intro: Hypolytrum condensatum, commonly known as the dense false heather, is a flowering plant native to New Zealand. It belongs to the family Restionaceae and is characterized by its compact growth habit and small, clustered flowers. It plays a role in stabilizing coastal dunes and provides habitat for native insects.
